Title: Relates to medicaid reimbursement for treatment in place and transportation to alternative health care settings by emergency medical services
Summary: Provides for medicaid reimbursement for emergency medical services when treatment in place is administered and/or when transportation is provided to alternative health care settings instead of a general hospital.
LawCode: Add ยง367-y, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to medicaid reimbursement for treatment in place and transportation to alternative health care settings by emergency medical services
